heading: False statements in certification of correction
text:
For the purposes of this section 28-204.5, if the environmental control
board finds that a certification of correction filed pursuant to section 28-204.2 contained material false statements relating to the
correction of a violation, such certification of correction shall be null and void and the penalties set forth in this code for the violation
may be imposed as if such false certification had not been filed with and accepted by the department. It shall be an affirmative
defense that the respondent neither knew nor should have known that such statements were false.
